tu.tuv: oṃ namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisatvebhyaḥ || nama āryamaṃjuśriye kumārabhūtāya ||
大寶積經卷第三十五 大唐三藏法師玄奘奉 詔譯
卷第一西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試光祿卿傳梵大師賜紫沙門臣法護等奉 詔譯

bam po daṅ po | rgya gar skad du | āryabodhisatvapiṭakanāmamahāyānasūtra | bod skad du | ’phags pa byaṅ chub sems dpa’i sde snod ces bya ba theg pa chen po’i mdo || saṅs rgyas daṅ byaṅ chub sems dpa’ thams cad la phyag ’tshal lo ||
Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisatvas! Homage to the princely Mañjuśrī!
